attributes.action: stop giving extra finacial help to those on benefits and low earners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a slightly above earner with my own small business i am fed up with the poor being given grants and aid for just about anything..its not fair.I dont want to pay extra tax for it to be given to those who cant be bothered to work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
